name: Freshdesk
description: Customer support software with ticketing, knowledge base and automation

opengraph.title: Freshdesk: Agentic AI platform for modern customer service | Freshworks
opengraph.description: Freshdesk is an AI-powered customer service solution that’s easy to set up, simple to use, and built to boost agent productivity and deliver seamless customer experiences. Try it free!
